price: Iyo Dushaka rero, Twari kuyagira amazi y’icunyunyu ku buryo mudashobora kuyakoresha mu kunywa no mu kuvomera ibiterwa vyanyu. Ubwo none, ntimwoshimira Imana Allah ku nema yo kuronswa amazi y’akanovera!
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
